triples.name: Retrieval-augmented generation
triples.relevance: RAG is the baseline approach that GraphRAG builds upon to improve handling of global corpus-level questions.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the core components used in both the graph construction and response generation stages of GraphRAG.

triples.name: Automatic summarization
triples.relevance: Query-focused summarization is a key capability that GraphRAG employs through community summaries and final response aggregation.

triples.name: Knowledge graph
triples.relevance: The paper proposes constructing entity knowledge graphs from documents as a novel approach to organizing and querying document collections.

triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: Question answering over text corpora is the primary task that GraphRAG addresses, particularly for global sensemaking questions.
